snippet.title: Beyond the Chiron Gate trailer
snippet.description:
Beyond the Chiron Gate is a text-based space exploration roguelike. Explore an endless universe filled with exotic planets, strange life forms, and ancient civilisations. Manage a crew of space explorers and upgrade their ship with new technology. Brave dangerous worlds to gather the data you need to reach the home system of the mysterious Gatebuilders.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2960700/Beyond_the_Chiron_Gate/
itch.io: https://johnayliff.itch.io/beyond-the-chiron-gate
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.johnayliff.beyondthechirongate
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/beyond-the-chiron-gate/id1624155440

Music by @wiktoriazac
